title.english: Call of the Night
title.romaji: Yofukashi no Uta

141391.description:
Wracked by insomnia and wanderlust, Kou Yamori is driven onto the moonlit streets every night in an aimless search for something he can’t seem to name. His nightly ritual is marked by purposeless introspection — until he meets Nazuna, who might just be a vampire! Kou’s new companion could offer him dark gifts and a vampire’s immortality. But there are conditions that must be met before Kou can sink his teeth into vampirism, and he’ll have to discover just how far he’s willing to go to satisfy his desires before he can heed the Call of the Night!

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)
synonymns: เพลงรักมนุษย์ค้างคาว

title.english: Yofukashi no Uta Mini
title.romaji: Yofukashi no Uta Mini

150583.description: Mini animations posted on the Yofukashi no Uta Twitter account.

title.english: Call of the Night Season 2
title.romaji: Yofukashi no Uta Season 2

175914.description:
The second season of Yofukashi no Uta.

Ko overcomes his confusion about becoming a vampire and decides to "like" Nazuna, while Nazuna resolves to make Ko "fall in love" with her. Without understanding what "love" even is, the two of them spend their nights together in a frenzy. Meanwhile, Detective Uguisu Anko is closing in with her plot to kill vampires, not just Nazuna. A vampire's weakness is "anything they were attached to when they were human" and so they all try to get rid of this weakness before it's too late. But, Nazuna has no memory of her human life. What is Nazuna's hidden past? Why did Anko start killing vampires? And what is the "secret" that Nazuna and Anko share? For Ko, Nazuna, Anko, a fun "late night" doesn't end here... a new "night" begins!

(Source: HIDIVE)

title.english: All Night Radio
title.romaji: All Night Radio

170915.description: Music video directed by Souta Oozawa for the song All Night Radio by Ado.

title.english: The nights when the angels call me
title.romaji: Yoru ga Boku wo Ookikusuru

141161.description: Graduate work of Haruhi Kosaka at Tama Art University.

title.english: My Hero Academia the Movie: Two Heroes Specials
title.romaji: Boku no Hero Academia THE MOVIE: Futari no Hero Specials

105893.description:
Short OVAs included with the Blu-ray/DVD release of Boku no Hero Academia the Movie: Futari no Hero.
Episode 1 is a short animation about All Might's past.
Episode 2 is an epilogue picture drama for Boku no Hero Academia the Movie: Futari no Hero.

title.english: Dragon Ball Z: The Tree of Might
title.romaji: Dragon Ball Z: Chikyuu Marugoto Chou Kessen

896.description:
The Saiyajin named Turlus has come to Earth in order to plant a tree that will both destroy the planet and give him infinite strength. Son Goku and the Z Warriors cannot let this happen and duke it out with the invaders for the sake of the planet.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonymns: Dragon Ball Z: La super batalla
ดราก้อนบอล Z เดอะมูฟวี่ 3 ศึกสะท้านพิภพ
Bảy Viên Ngọc Rồng Z: Mầm Cây Sinh Lực
Dragon Ball Z: Największy pojedynek na świecie
Dragon Ball Z: Det store slaget
Dragon Ball Z: Det stora slaget

title.english: Future Card Buddyfight X: All-Star Fight
title.romaji: Future Card Buddyfight X: All-Star Fight

101385.description: The fifth season of Future Card Buddyfight.

8.title: Episode 8 - Break Past the Final Qualifier!

11.title: Episode 11 - The Start of the Aibo Buddy Cup!

12.title: Episode 12 - Power vs. Ninja Arts! A Fierce Competition!

14.title: Episode 14 - Noble Heart! Together with the Dragon Knight!

15.title: Episode 15 - Dragons Duel! Journey of the Tiger!

16.title: Episode 16 - Mystique Explosion! The Great Katana World Battle!

17.title: Episode 17 - ABC Cup Final! Exploring the Underground Maze!

19.title: Episode 19 - The Card Yota Left Behind!

24.title: Episode 24 - The Friends of Dungeon World!

26.title: Episode 26 - A Challenge From Legend World!

31.title: Episode 31 - Gao’s Buddy Skill is On!

33.title: Episode 33 - Gao vs. Rouga! Round Two!

40.title: Episode 40 - The Darkness of Dragon World!

48.title: Episode 48 - The Dancing Demon takes on Medusa!

52.title: Episode 52 - Generations Collide! Drum Breaker Dragon!

53.title: Episode 53 - Sword of Nothingness! Distortion Punisher!!

54.title: Episode 54 - Wolf versus Fox! A Battle of Instinct!

56.title: Episode 56 - Master versus Apprentice! Death Tallica and Explosive Dragon Fang!

57.title: Episode 57 - Take Back the Buddy Police!

58.title: Episode 58 - Gaen Cup Final Round! Tetsuya's Choice!

60.title: Episode 60 - Gao and Tasuku’s Epic Battle!

title.english: High School of the Dead
title.romaji: Gakuen Mokushiroku: HIGHSCHOOL OF THE DEAD

8074.description:
The lockers are splattered with blood, the student bodies are piling up and that's not mystery meat they're eating in the cafeteria… it's the faculty! And that's just the start of the worst day of school ever when a nightmarish virus is unleashed, turning humans into flesh eating zombies and converting Fujimi High School into a literal hell on Earth. Now it's a crash course in survival, and the only test or skill that matters is the ability to keep moving, breathing and fighting. Because if nerds, jocks and the surviving staff can't find a way to work together to escape this carnal house of education, they're all going to end up on the menu. And that's assuming there's anyplace safe left to escape to.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)
synonymns: High School of the Dead: Apocalipsis en el Instituto

title.english: Precure All Stars DX2: Kibou no Hikari☆Rainbow Jewel wo Mamore!
title.romaji: Precure All Stars DX2: Kibou no Hikari☆Rainbow Jewel wo Mamore!

8133.description: Tsubomi Hanasaki is woken by her best friend Erika Kurumi only to find out that their two fairies, Coffret and Shypre, have left just leaving a note explaining where to find them. Fairy Park is not only the destination of both girls, it is also the meeting point of all other Precures who planned to spend this special day together. This magical theme park holds the Rainbow Jewel, a special gem that represents all of the hopes and dreams of the world. Such a powerful stone is the object of desire of a malefic entity named Bottom who has waited one thousand years for the opportunity to possess it.
synonymns: Eiga Precure All Stars DX2: Kibou no Hikari - Rainbow Jewel wo Mamore!
Pretty Cure All Stars DX2: Light of Hope - Protect the Rainbow Jewel!

A vampire's weakness is "anything they were attached to when they were human" and so they all try to get rid of this weakness before it's too late. But, Nazuna has no memory of her human life. What is Nazuna's hidden past? Why did Anko start killing vampires? And what is the "secret" that Nazuna and Anko share? For Ko, Nazuna, Anko, a fun "late night" doesn't end here... a new "night" begins!

(Source: HIDIVE)

title.romaji: All Night Radio

Episode 1 is a short animation about All Might's past.
Episode 2 is an epilogue picture drama for Boku no Hero Academia the Movie: Futari no Hero.

title.english: Dragon Ball Z: The Tree of Might
title.romaji: Dragon Ball Z: Chikyuu Marugoto Chou Kessen

896.description:
The Saiyajin named Turlus has come to Earth in order to plant a tree that will both destroy the planet and give him infinite strength. Son Goku and the Z Warriors cannot let this happen and duke it out with the invaders for the sake of the planet.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonymns: Dragon Ball Z: La super batalla
ดราก้อนบอล Z เดอะมูฟวี่ 3 ศึกสะท้านพิภพ
Bảy Viên Ngọc Rồng Z: Mầm Cây Sinh Lực
Dragon Ball Z: Największy pojedynek na świecie
Dragon Ball Z: Det store slaget
Dragon Ball Z: Det stora slaget

title.romaji: Future Card Buddyfight X: All-Star Fight

101385.description: The fifth season of Future Card Buddyfight.

8.title: Episode 8 - Break Past the Final Qualifier!

11.title: Episode 11 - The Start of the Aibo Buddy Cup!

12.title: Episode 12 - Power vs. Ninja Arts! A Fierce Competition!

title.english: High School of the Dead
title.romaji: Gakuen Mokushiroku: HIGHSCHOOL OF THE DEAD

8074.description:
The lockers are splattered with blood, the student bodies are piling up and that's not mystery meat they're eating in the cafeteria… it's the faculty! And that's just the start of the worst day of school ever when a nightmarish virus is unleashed, turning humans into flesh eating zombies and converting Fujimi High School into a literal hell on Earth. Now it's a crash course in survival, and the only test or skill that matters is the ability to keep moving, breathing and fighting. Because if nerds, jocks and the surviving staff can't find a way to work together to escape this carnal house of education, they're all going to end up on the menu. And that's assuming there's anyplace safe left to escape to.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)
synonymns: High School of the Dead: Apocalipsis en el Instituto

title.english: Precure All Stars DX2: Kibou no Hikari☆Rainbow Jewel wo Mamore!
title.romaji: Precure All Stars DX2: Kibou no Hikari☆Rainbow Jewel wo Mamore!

8133.description: Tsubomi Hanasaki is woken by her best friend Erika Kurumi only to find out that their two fairies, Coffret and Shypre, have left just leaving a note explaining where to find them. Fairy Park is not only the destination of both girls, it is also the meeting point of all other Precures who planned to spend this special day together. This magical theme park holds the Rainbow Jewel, a special gem that represents all of the hopes and dreams of the world. Such a powerful stone is the object of desire of a malefic entity named Bottom who has waited one thousand years for the opportunity to possess it.
synonymns: Eiga Precure All Stars DX2: Kibou no Hikari - Rainbow Jewel wo Mamore!
Pretty Cure All Stars DX2: Light of Hope - Protect the Rainbow Jewel!

title.english: Call of the Night
title.romaji: Yofukashi no Uta

141391.description:
Wracked by insomnia and wanderlust, Kou Yamori is driven onto the moonlit streets every night in an aimless search for something he can’t seem to name. His nightly ritual is marked by purposeless introspection — until he meets Nazuna, who might just be a vampire! Kou’s new companion could offer him dark gifts and a vampire’s immortality. But there are conditions that must be met before Kou can sink his teeth into vampirism, and he’ll have to discover just how far he’s willing to go to satisfy his desires before he can heed the Call of the Night!

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)
synonymns: เพลงรักมนุษย์ค้างคาว

title.english: Yofukashi no Uta Mini
title.romaji: Yofukashi no Uta Mini

150583.description: Mini animations posted on the Yofukashi no Uta Twitter account.
